chat.content:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall t1 t2 : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves (pbnode t1 t2) -> distinct_pbleaves t1

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
distinct_pbleaves = fun t : pbtree => forall t0 t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb (pbnode t1 t2) t -> inpb t0 t1 -> inpb t0 t2 -> False : pbtree -> Prop
inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
Inductive inpb : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop := inpb_leaf : forall t : pbtree, inpb t t | inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1) | inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1) | inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2) | inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
inpb_ind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
inpb_sind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> SProp, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
inpb_trans : forall t1 t2 t3 : pbtree, inpb t1 t2 -> inpb t2 t3 -> inpb t1 t3
innodeL : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
innodeR : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
Inductive inb (A : Type) : btree A -> btree A -> Prop := inleaf : forall t : btree A, inb t t | innodeL : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2) | innodeR : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2) Arguments inb [A]%type_scope Arguments inleaf _%type_scope Arguments innodeL _%type_scope Arguments innodeR _%type_scope
inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1)
inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1)
distinct_pbleaves_Leaf : forall a : A, distinct_pbleaves (pbleaf a)
height_pred_node : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
pbtree_dec : forall a b : pbtree, {a = b} + {a <> b}
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
height_pred_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
distinct_leaves_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a : btree A, {distinct_leaves a} + {~ distinct_leaves a}
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
Inductive height_pred (A : Type) : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := height_pred_nil : forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), height_pred n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t | height_pred_node : forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2) Arguments height_pred [A]%type_scope _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments height_pred_nil _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments height_pred_node _%type_scope _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
restrict_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> code A
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
add_frequency_list_not_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a b : A) (n : nat), a <> b -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec b m)
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0

```intros t1 t2 H. unfold distinct_pbleaves in H. intros t0 t1' t2' H1 H2 H3. apply H. apply inpb_node_l with (t1:=t1') (t2:=t2'). apply inpb_node_r with (t1:=t1') (t2:=t2'). apply H1. apply H2. apply H3.```
